description: The QUICKEN2017BACKUP file is designed for users looking to back up their account information from the .QUICKEN2017 file. In any event that the QUICKEN2017 file becomes corrupt or is lost, the backup file can be used to restore the information.

To create a backup file in Quicken, simply select File → Save a Backup... and choose the destination folder. To restore data from a backup file, select File → Restore a Backup... and locate the backup file.
